# package_name

Description. 
The package package_operacoes is used to:
	- Sum
	- Subtraction

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_operacoes
```bash
pip install package_calc
```

## Usage

```python
from package_operacoes import funcoes
funcoes.my_function()
```
